mapper.insert: insert into weather_month (areaName, areaCode, month, urlName, url, crawlFlag, crawlCount, validStatus, insertTime, updateTime) values (#{areaName}, #{areaCode}, #{month}, #{urlName}, #{url}, #{crawlFlag}, #{crawlCount}, #{validStatus}, #{insertTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into weather_month (areaName, areaCode, date, year, month, day, temperatureMax, temperatureMin, summary, windDirection, windScale, remark, validStatus, insertTime, updateTime) values
(#{item.areaName}, #{item.areaCode}, #{item.month}, #{item.urlName}, #{item.url}, #{item.crawlFlag}, #{item.crawlCount}, #{item.validStatus}, #{item.insertTime}, #{item.updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weather_month WHERE month = #{month} and areaName = #{areaName}
mapper.delete: delete from weather_month where month = #{month} and areaName = #{areaName}
mapper.update: update weather_month set areaCode=#{areaCode}, urlName=#{urlName}, url=#{url}, crawlFlag=#{crawlFlag}, crawlCount=#{crawlCount}, validStatus=#{validStatus}, updateTime=#{updateTime} where month = #{month} and areaName = #{areaName}
